item.title: Communities
item.description: General Joining a community Creating a community Leaving a community Manage Community Creating Channels Public Channels Private Channels Categories Channels within a community might be organized in categories. Only the community admin might create/edit/delete a category. Creating a channel in a category works by calling wakuext_reorderCommunityChat after the chat is created, then the Chat is immediatly assigned a categoryId.
